description: Jon Fayle admitted spending time with his girlfriend when he should have been self-isolating.
title: Coronavirus: Man jailed for self-isolation breach had 'no excuse'
title_page: Coronavirus: Man jailed for self-isolation breach had 'no excuse' - BBC News
maintext: After being tipped off by a member of the public, police visited the address to check on Fayle and found him sitting in close contact with his family and his girlfriend.
